message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $11500 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on it. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but unfortunately I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $10500. That would still leave me a fair margin for the product.  Let me know if you're interested in that price.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product.
